title: 8 Pieces That Are the Secret Sauce to an Incredibly Chic Summer Outfit Rotation
description: Getting ready just got so much easier.
author: Jennifer Camp Forbes
excerpt: Getting ready just got so much easier.
text: Getting ready is not always easy, especially in the hotter months. At least, that's my experience. There's something about the heat that makes it hard to want to put in too much effort. Thankfully, there are some key pieces this season that make getting ready effortless—keeping you looking chic without any heavy lifting. I narrowed it down to eight items that can seamlessly fit into just about any closet.In my highly curated list below, you'll find a mix of classic yet trendy finds, including timeless linen pieces, elevated dresses, pretty skirts, polished shorts, and sleek sandals. I'm partial to the kitten-heel sandals, in particular. Scroll on to discover and shop eight key pieces that are the secret sauce to an incredibly chic summer outfit rotation.Sleek SandalsI often plan my outfits around my shoes, and right now, simple yet sleek sandals have my attention, especially in kitten-heel and strappy form.Shop Sandals Reformation Stacy Heeled Sandal TKEES Square Toe Twiggy Sandal Steve Madden Cary Heeled Sandal ZARA Flat Strappy Sandals With Metal Ornament Open Edit Tori Kitten Heel Sandal Classic Linen PiecesLinen fashion is not groundbreaking, but that's for a reason: It's a forever classic. Opt for everything from linen pants to tops, dresses, skirts, and more.Shop Linen Pieces J.Crew Cutaway Vest Top in Linen Reformation Olina Linen Pant Reiss Belle Linen Button-Up Shirt Caslon Wide Leg Pull-On Linen Blend Pants ZW Collection 100% Linen Tunic Dress Pretty SkirtsI've never been super into skirts, but with options this chic—lace, poplin, polka dots— it's hard not to jump on the bandwagon for summer.Shop Skirts Anthropologie The Tilda Mini Slip Skirt: Lace Edition Open Edit Cotton Poplin Maxi Skirt With Jéan Maeve Midi Skirt Madewell Linen Maxi Slip Skirt Elevated DressesIt's officially dress season, and the selection is top-notch. You can't go wrong with an elevated pick that you can wear for a lifetime in black, white, or neutral tones.Shop Dresses DISSH Gabby White Cotton Midi Dress J.Crew Hyacinth V-Neck Dress in Ramie Madewell Seamed Poplin Midi Sundress Polished ShortsA great way to stay cool without sacrificing style is to go for a polished pair of shorts. Try a high waist, a longer length, an interesting hem, or a mix of everything.Shop Shorts Open Edit Everyday Pleated Linen Blend Shorts ZARA High-Waisted Linen Shorts Favorite Daughter The Tommy Low Slung Denim Bermuda Zw Collection Crochet Shorts Nordstrom Pleated Linen Blend Shorts Standout Basic TopsBasic tops are likely the most-worn pieces in your closet, so why not reach for some standout styles? Think picks with interesting necklines and rich colors.Shop Basic Tops H&M Microfiber Sleeveless Top Open Edit Drape Back Sleeveless Top ELOQUII Twist Sleeve One Shoulder Top ZARA Smooth Knit Basic Top Effortless BagsA great bag can really pull an outfit together. This season, it's all about effortless bags, including woven details, east-west styles, beach-ready totes, and cool silhouettes.Shop Bags Madewell Handwoven Leather Tote AQUA East West Medium Shoulder Bag MANGO Braided Leather Top Handle Bag Eye-Catching NecklacesIt's time to set aside the dainty necklaces for eye-catching picks. Seashells and cord necklaces with pendants are fashion-set favorites at the moment.Shop Necklaces JUJU VERA Petra Shell Necklace Silver Heaven Mayhem Julia Necklace Madewell Seashell Pendant Necklace j.crew Faux-Pearl and Leather Cord Necklace Mayamar Beaded Swirl Necklace
html:
Getting ready is not always easy, especially in the hotter months. At least, that's my experience. There's something about the heat that makes it hard to want to put in too much effort. Thankfully, there are some key pieces this season that make getting ready effortless—keeping you looking chic without any heavy lifting. I narrowed it down to eight items that can seamlessly fit into just about any closet.

In my highly curated list below, you'll find a mix of classic yet trendy finds, including timeless linen pieces, elevated dresses, pretty skirts, polished shorts, and sleek sandals. I'm partial to the kitten-heel sandals, in particular. Scroll on to discover and shop eight key pieces that are the secret sauce to an incredibly chic summer outfit rotation.

Sleek Sandals

I often plan my outfits around my shoes, and right now, simple yet sleek sandals have my attention, especially in kitten-heel and strappy form.

Shop Sandals

Reformation

Stacy Heeled Sandal

TKEES

Square Toe Twiggy Sandal

Steve Madden

Cary Heeled Sandal

ZARA

Flat Strappy Sandals With Metal Ornament

Open Edit

Tori Kitten Heel Sandal

Classic Linen Pieces

Linen fashion is not groundbreaking, but that's for a reason: It's a forever classic. Opt for everything from linen pants to tops, dresses, skirts, and more.

Shop Linen Pieces

J.Crew

Cutaway Vest Top in Linen

Reformation

Olina Linen Pant

Reiss

Belle Linen Button-Up Shirt

Caslon

Wide Leg Pull-On Linen Blend Pants

ZW Collection

100% Linen Tunic Dress

Pretty Skirts

I've never been super into skirts, but with options this chic—lace, poplin, polka dots— it's hard not to jump on the bandwagon for summer.

Shop Skirts

Anthropologie

The Tilda Mini Slip Skirt: Lace Edition

Open Edit

Cotton Poplin Maxi Skirt

With Jéan

Maeve Midi Skirt

Madewell

Linen Maxi Slip Skirt

Elevated Dresses

It's officially dress season, and the selection is top-notch. You can't go wrong with an elevated pick that you can wear for a lifetime in black, white, or neutral tones.

Shop Dresses

DISSH

Gabby White Cotton Midi Dress

J.Crew

Hyacinth V-Neck Dress in Ramie

Madewell

Seamed Poplin Midi Sundress

Polished Shorts

A great way to stay cool without sacrificing style is to go for a polished pair of shorts. Try a high waist, a longer length, an interesting hem, or a mix of everything.

Shop Shorts

Open Edit

Everyday Pleated Linen Blend Shorts

ZARA

High-Waisted Linen Shorts

Favorite Daughter

The Tommy Low Slung Denim Bermuda

Zw Collection

Crochet Shorts

Nordstrom

Pleated Linen Blend Shorts

Standout Basic Tops

Basic tops are likely the most-worn pieces in your closet, so why not reach for some standout styles? Think picks with interesting necklines and rich colors.

Shop Basic Tops

H&M

Microfiber Sleeveless Top

Open Edit

Drape Back Sleeveless Top

ELOQUII

Twist Sleeve One Shoulder Top

ZARA

Smooth Knit Basic Top

Effortless Bags

A great bag can really pull an outfit together. This season, it's all about effortless bags, including woven details, east-west styles, beach-ready totes, and cool silhouettes.

Shop Bags

Madewell

Handwoven Leather Tote

AQUA

East West Medium Shoulder Bag

MANGO

Braided Leather Top Handle Bag

Eye-Catching Necklaces

It's time to set aside the dainty necklaces for eye-catching picks. Seashells and cord necklaces with pendants are fashion-set favorites at the moment.

Shop Necklaces

JUJU VERA

Petra Shell Necklace Silver

Heaven Mayhem

Julia Necklace

Madewell

Seashell Pendant Necklace

j.crew

Faux-Pearl and Leather Cord Necklace

Mayamar

Beaded Swirl Necklace
